name: Money Empire Fan made Remake
description:
Money Empire Fan made Remake

Back when I started batch scripting, I loved this game plus it was one of the first of many cmd games I played so I just wanted to remake it.

Features
  • Money, lots of money
  • Custom art
  • Mouse input
  • Credits (Including the original creators).
  • A cool little So and so presents... screen
  • 200 and something lines of code
  • Very short game, though you can easily hack it so it can be fun, I guess
  • And yes, I did make an icon for the remake (See on the thumbnail for this project), since they didn't have one. To use it, just create a shortcut for "MoneyEmpire.cmd", and then right-click on it and head to the option "Properties". From there you'll be able to see how you can change the icon.
Update log +  estimated release date 1.3.5 | 4/9/22

The remake- (Game version taken after the original game's version.)
